DOC.brief_title: Use FreeStyle Navigator Continuous Glucose Monitoring System Enhance Education Glycaemic Control
DOC.detailed_description: Study Overview This multi-centre pilot study across 6 study site , recruit 50 subject . Each subject use FreeStyle Navigator Continuous Glucose Monitor period 20 day start study , Healthcare Professionals ( HCPs ) may recommend change glucose management base continuous glucose monitoring ( CGM ) data . Subjects return self-managing diabetes blood glucose meter . After 2 month , subject use FreeStyle Navigator 5 day review result glucose management HCPs . Subjects return self-managing diabetes blood glucose meter end study , last FreeStyle Navigator 5 day wear complete HbA1c measure glycaemic variability record .
